channel.title: iScape - Allstar Revisited! Needs a team!
channel.description:
iScape is going to be the most innovative Allstar-based server out there. In terms of content we are rapidly catching up to the pace-setters such as CreativeScape and Allstar-Legends.
Recent updates include but not limited to:
[ul][li]Complete drops rework now using a .cfg file to reference npc, item, amount (can use values in the cfg for random numbers [e.g. 600-800]), and chance of drop[/li] [li]Weapon speeds (longbow slower than shortbow faster than 2h, etc.)[/li] [li]Level, Range Bonus, Bow Type, and Arrow Type now are all factors in Ranged damage[/li] [li]Cleaned grammar[/li] [li]Fixed teleports[/li] [li]Back end clutter reductions[/li] [li]Proper anti 2h+shield, bow+shield[/li][/ul]
......................................................... Things to come very soon (if not already done, I probably won't update this every time I add something) -Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, and Saradomin GWD bosses, with special attacks and minions -Quest Tab reworks with openable Tabbing inside of it. -All skilling reworks (mining, thieving, fishing, cooking, firemaking, woodcutting, etc) -Prayer fixes (everyone knows prayer doesn't work in Allstars, well not for long) -Working Clan Chat -Webclient under our own domain. -IPBoards Forums -No more "Train" teleport....Monsters will be in locations walkable to, and each one will have individually catered drop logics. -"Juggernaut" Minigame -"Tag" Minigame -Castlewars Minigame -Elite Soldier boss -Barrellchest boss -Corrected Chaos Elementals -Members' benefits -Donator Zone -Donator items -New crowns for Server Support, Donators, Bug splatters -(Distant Future) Hunger Games Minigame
[size=18pt]Team Members I'm looking for:[/size]
[ol][li]Co-Developer[/li] [li]Bug Splatter #2[/li] [li]Web Master (who can get ipBoards with a theme SIMILAR to SoulSplit[/li] [li]Graphics Engineer[/li] [li]Community Manager[/li] [li]Game Mod x3[/li] [li]Game Admin x2[/li] [li]Server Help x5[/li][/ol]
If you're interested in filling one of these positions add my Skype: Connor.S68 so that we can discuss it more in detail.

item.title: iScape - Allstar Revisited! Needs a team!
item.dc:creator: @Paradox68 Paradox68
item.description:
@Paradox68 wrote:

iScape is going to be the most innovative Allstar-based server out there. In terms of content we are rapidly catching up to the pace-setters such as CreativeScape and Allstar-Legends.

Recent updates include but not limited to:

[ul][li]Complete drops rework now using a .cfg file to reference npc, item, amount (can use values in the cfg for random numbers [e.g. 600-800]), and chance of drop[/li]
[li]Weapon speeds (longbow slower than shortbow faster than 2h, etc.)[/li]
[li]Level, Range Bonus, Bow Type, and Arrow Type now are all factors in Ranged damage[/li]
[li]Cleaned grammar[/li]
[li]Fixed teleports[/li]
[li]Back end clutter reductions[/li]
[li]Proper anti 2h+shield, bow+shield[/li][/ul]

…
Things to come very soon (if not already done, I probably won’t update this every time I add something)
-Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, and Saradomin GWD bosses, with special attacks and minions
-Quest Tab reworks with openable Tabbing inside of it.
-All skilling reworks (mining, thieving, fishing, cooking, firemaking, woodcutting, etc)
-Prayer fixes (everyone knows prayer doesn’t work in Allstars, well not for long)
-Working Clan Chat
-Webclient under our own domain.
-IPBoards Forums
-No more “Train” teleport…Monsters will be in locations walkable to, and each one will have individually catered drop logics.
-“Juggernaut” Minigame
-“Tag” Minigame
-Castlewars Minigame
-Elite Soldier boss
-Barrellchest boss
-Corrected Chaos Elementals
-Members’ benefits
-Donator Zone
-Donator items
-New crowns for Server Support, Donators, Bug splatters
-(Distant Future) Hunger Games Minigame

[size=18pt]Team Members I’m looking for:[/size]

[ol][li]Co-Developer[/li]
[li]Bug Splatter #2[/li]
[li]Web Master (who can get ipBoards with a theme SIMILAR to SoulSplit[/li]
[li]Graphics Engineer[/li]
[li]Community Manager[/li]
[li]Game Mod x3[/li]
[li]Game Admin x2[/li]
[li]Server Help x5[/li][/ol]

If you’re interested in filling one of these positions add my Skype: Connor.S68 so that we can discuss it more in detail.
